notes: The design incorporates Brutalist aesthetics with an emphasis on raw materials like concrete and exposed finishes. All spaces are planned to meet local building codes and Vastu guidelines, ensuring that each living space benefits from positive energy flow. Balconies are designed as individual outdoor extensions for each bedroom on the first floor, maximizing views and natural ventilation in a corner plot setting.
